message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You get one dollar, I get the rest.  Seems fair, right?
A fair start, let's split it 2:3. You get a decent chunk, I get a decent chunk too.
Bob, I'm willing to give you a bit more than last time. I think this is a fair split - we both get a good amount, and we can avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our potential gains.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a bit more. I'll give you a bigger chunk, but you'll still have to make it worth my while.
